_meanings:
{@--2@} ({%a%}) To count, 
reckon; {#kAlaH kalayatAmahaM#} <ls>Bg. 10. 30</ls>
({%b%}) To measure, {#sadA pAMTaH pUzA#} 
{#gaganaparimARaM kalayati#} <ls>Bh. 2. 114.</ls>

{@--9@} To attach to, tie on;
furnish with.

{@--12@} To take hold
of the die called Kali.

{@--1@} To push on,
urge, drive forward.
